name: Catherine M. KOHL, Appellant, v. John Carl KOHL

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
McDERMOTT, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
585 A.2d 463
Catherine M. KOHL, Appellant, v. John Carl KOHL.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 14, 1991.
Decided Feb. 6, 1991.
Arthur L. Jenkins, Jr., Norristown, for appellant.
Marc R. Wolfe, James V. Fareri, Stroudsburg, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY,-McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
